description: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans wishes to purchase a Dasco Teledyne Marine RapidCast Underway Profiling System for delivery 14 weeks after contract award at Burlington, Ontario.
full_summary:
TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT
=====================================

**F2915-220002 - Dasco Teledyne Marine RapidCast Underway Profiling System**
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Reference:** WS3733019035-Doc3733943180
**Solicitation Number:** WS3733019035
**Publication Date:** November 9, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** November 23, 2022, 14:00 EST

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking to procure a Dasco Teledyne Marine RapidCast Underway Profiling System for the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) under the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and other trade agreements listed in the Trade Agreements section.

**Procurement Details:**

*   **Contract ID:** WS3733019035-Doc3733943180
*   **Contract Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
*   **Region of Delivery:** Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 25, 2022
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** November 30, 2027

**Contracting Entity:**

*   **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)** 
    *   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
    *   Contact: Melanie Parent (Parent.Melanie@TPSARG-TPMSGSRC.GL CRA Gov PGSPWACCNCSRIbid Cernal Matcher : (407) 453-2380), melanie.parent@tPSGC-PWCGSC.GC.CA

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, and other applicable international agreements.

**Required Documents:**

All required documents must be submitted by the closing date of November 23, 2022, by 14:00 EST. Late submissions will not be accepted.

**Tender Description:**

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is seeking to purchase a Dasco Teledyne Marine RapidCast Underway Profiling System for deployment in the client's country. The required system must be capable of delivering high-quality results. The selected contractor is expected to deliver the system 14 weeks after contract award at Burlington,
